Scripts.OnLoad: GHM_Window_OnLoad(self);
GHM_Window_Test_OnLoad(self);
GHM_SetUpRoundIcon(self);
GHM_SetUpRoundIcon(self,true);
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") self:SetMovable();
self:SetText("\60 Back");
self:SetText("Next \62");

Scripts.OnValueChanged: self.StackSliderValues = {1,5,10,20,50,100} self.amount = self.StackSliderValues[math.floor(self:GetValue()+0.5)]; if self:GetName() and _G[self:GetName().."CountLabel"] then _G[self:GetName().."CountLabel"]:SetText(self.amount) end if not(self.main == nil) then self.main.SetLabel(self.label,self.amount); end if self.OnValueChanged then self.OnValueChanged(self.amount) end

if not(self.SliderValues) then self.SliderValues = {1,5,10,15,30,60,120,60*5,60*10,60*15,60*30,60*60,60*60*2,60*60*5,60*60*10,60*60*20,60*60*24} self:SetMinMaxValues(1,17); end self.secs = self.SliderValues[math.floor(self:GetValue()+0.5)]; if self.GHI_GetTimeString then _G[self:GetName().."CountLabel"]:SetText(self.GHI_GetTimeString(self.secs)) end
if not(self.main == nil) then self.main.SetLabel(self.label,self.secs); end if self.OnValueChanged then self.OnValueChanged(self.secs) end

Scripts.OnLoad: local f = self;
Scripts.OnValueChanged: if not(self.StackSliderValues) or not(self:OrigGetValue()) then return end self.amount = self.StackSliderValues[math.floor(self:OrigGetValue()+0.5)]; _G[self:GetName().."Label2"]:SetText(self.amount..GHI_Loc().SLOTS) if self.OnValueChanged then self.OnValueChanged(self.amount) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetValueStep(1) local f = self; f.Force = function(data) if type(data) == "number" and f.SliderValues then
for i=1,#(f.SliderValues) do if f.SliderValues[i] == data then f:SetValue(i); break; end end end end f.Clear = function(self) f:SetValue(1); end
